title: World War is raging across Europe, and Castle

note: When the title page appears press RETURN to display the selection page and your present rank.
title: Your Mission: Find the war plans and escape from Castle Wolfenstein ALiVE! starting the game: Boot the program disk

note: To exit to the selection page without generating a new castle, press RETURN. Playing the game:
title: Press CTRL-N to generate a new castle. After pressing CTRL-N, the screen will display the options available. To generate a new castle and retain your present rank, press CTRL-C. To generate a new castle and reset your rank to Private, press CTRL-R
